name: sdd-workflow
description: An English plugin supporting AI-driven Specification-Driven Development (AI-SDD) workflow. Prevents Vibe Coding problems and achieves high-quality implementations using specifications as the source of truth.

skills.name: output-templates
skills.description: Provides output format templates for AI-SDD workflow commands (9 types: init, breakdown, check_spec, clarify, cleanup, constitution, migrate, prd, spec)

skills.name: sdd-templates
skills.description: Provides project document templates (PRD_TEMPLATE.md, SPECIFICATION_TEMPLATE.md, DESIGN_DOC_TEMPLATE.md, CONSTITUTION.md)

skills.name: vibe-detector
skills.description: Automatically executed before implementation to analyze user instructions and detect Vibe Coding (vague instructions), prompting for clarification

skills.name: doc-consistency-checker
skills.description: Automatically executed during document updates or before implementation to check consistency between PRD ↔ *_spec.md ↔ *_design.md
